naslov: Kustošija, prodaja predivne kuće 200m2 sa okućnicom 1600m2 u prirodi s (prodaja)
opis: GORNJA KUSTOŠIJA OBITELJSKA KUĆA 200M2 SA PUNO POTENCIJALA NA PARCELI OD 1471M2 SA VRTNOM KUĆICOM I PARKIRNIM MJESTIMA Detalji: - ulazni hodnik i sptepenice za gronji kat - ravno je kupaonica sa tuš kabinom - lijevo open space kuhinja blagavaonica i boravak te izlaz na zimski vrt i ljetnu terasu . na tom nivou je ljetna kuhinja vešeraj te ostava sa vinskim podrumom - na katu se nalaze dvije spavače sobe Specifičnosti: - kuća ima 5cm izo stirpor fasadu - šindru na krovu - vrtnu kućicu za alat - kamere - natkrivena parking mjesta - kovane ograde - izuzetno uređenu okućnicu - čisto vlasništvo - uporabna dozvaola U blizini su svi sadržaji kao i javni prijevoz. Njegovana okućnica, u mirnom dijelu Gornje Kustošije sa pogledom na šumu, ova krasna kuća čeka obitelj koja će ju obogatiti svojojom odlukom o kupnji. Za sve dodatne informacije kao i razgled, veselimo se Vašim pozivima. Ivana +38 598 304 111 GORNJA KUSTOŠIJA FAMILY HOUSE 200M2 WITH LOTS OF POTENTIAL ON A PLOT OF 1471M2 WITH GARDEN HOUSE AND PARKING SPACES Details: - entrance hall and stairs to the upper floor - bathroom with shower - open space kitchen, dining room, and living room on the left and access to the winter garden and summer terrace . on that level is the summer kitchen, laundry room,  and storage room with a wine cellar - upstairs there are two bedrooms Specifics: - the house has a 5cm insulated styrofoam facade - shingles on the roof - garden tool house - cameras - covered parking spaces - wrought iron fences - exceptionally landscaped garden - clean ownership - use permit All amenities are nearby, as well as public transport. A well-kept garden, in a quiet part of Gornja Kustošija with a view of the forest, this beautiful house is waiting for a family who will enrich it with their decision to buy a house. For all additional information and viewing, we look forward to your calls. Ivana +38 598 304 111
